long_description: Lounge by your favorite swimming hole on a hot summer day with the comfortable REI Bolongo water shorts. Nylon fabric provides UPF 30+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Mesh liner brief allows water to drain; gusseted crotch enables unrestricted motion. Elastic waistband with a nylon webbing belt ensures a secure fit. Side-seam pocket stows beach essentials; rear pocket with rip-and-stick closure and front hand pockets provide additional storage. Mesh pocket bags increase ventilation and allow water to drain. REI Bolongo water shorts have a relaxed fit.
short_description: Lounge by your favorite swimming hole on a hot summer day with the comfortable REI Bolongo water shorts.
